pattpack.pooledlist
Class Pool<E>

java.lang.Object
  pattpack.pooledlist.Pool<E>

public class Pool<E>
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a pool of list cells. It also maintains some statistics about the pool usage.

Field Summary

private  int held

 void release(Cons<E> cons)
          Return a list cell to the pool.
 void statistics()
          Print on standard output the number of cell nodes that have been constructed, that have been created, and that are held by the pool since the beginning of execution.

Constructor Detail

Pool

public Pool()
Method Detail

acquire

public Cons<E> acquire(E e,
                       List<E> list)
Acquire a list cell. The cell is recycled from the pool if any is available; otherwise it is created by the list cell constructor. The argument are for the initialization of the cell.

Parameters:
object - The head of the pooled cell.
list - The tail of the pooled cell.
Returns:
A list cell.

release

public void release(Cons<E> cons)
Return a list cell to the pool.

Parameters:
cons - The list cell to return to the pool.

statistics

public void statistics()
Print on standard output the number of cell nodes that have been constructed, that have been created, and that are held by the pool since the beginning of execution.
